ci_support_linux_64_python3.6.____cpytho:
boost_cpp:
- 1.74.0
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '9'
cairo:
- '1.16'
cdt_name:
- cos6
channel_sources:
- conda-forge,defaults
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '9'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-comp7
glib:
- '2'
gmp:
- '6'
jsoncpp:
- 1.9.4
libuuid:
- 2.32.1
pcre:
- '8'
pin_run_as_build:
  boost-cpp:
    max_pin: x.x.x
  cairo:
    max_pin: x.x
  gmp:
    max_pin: x
  jsoncpp:
    max_pin: x.x.x
  libuuid:
    max_pin: x
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
  sqlite:
    max_pin: x
  zeromq:
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.6.* *_cpython
sqlite:
- '3'
target_platform:
- linux-64
zeromq:
- 4.3.4
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version
- - cdt_name
  - docker_image

about.summary: a field-theory motivated approach to computer algebra
a field-theory motivated approach to computer algebra

name: cadabra2-split

about.summary: a field-theory motivated approach to computer algebra

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "cadabra2" %}
{% set version = "2.3.0" %}

package:
  name: cadabra2-split
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/kpeeters/cadabra2/releases/download/{{ version }}/cadabra2-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 144b4123e0e1f89592dc5e51e30c0e3ecf819a3288f5e1c88bddc7474e9f8a56

build:
  number: 8
  skip: True  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake
    - make
    - pkg-config
    - {{ cdt('libice-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libsm-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libx11-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxcomposite-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxcursor-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxdamage-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxext-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxi-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxinerama-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxfixes-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxrandr-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxrender-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxtst-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-libEGL-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-libGL-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('xorg-x11-proto-devel') }}  # [linux]

  host:
    - python
    - gmp
    - jsoncpp
    - pybind11

    - boost-cpp
    - sqlite
    - pcre
    - gtkmm-3.0
    - glibmm
    - cairomm-1.0
    - glib
    - sigcpp-2.0
    - pangomm-1.4
    - cairo
    - atkmm-1.6
    - gtkmm
    
    - xeus
    - zeromq
    - cppzmq
    - nlohmann_json
    - xtl
    - libuuid
    # Needed for ctest
    - sympy

outputs:
  - name: cadabra2
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
      host:
        - python
        - gmp
        - pybind11
        - jsoncpp
      run:
        - python
        - sympy
        - matplotlib-base
    files:
      - lib/python*/site-packages/cdb/**/*
      - lib/python*/site-packages/cadabra2.so
      - lib/python*/site-packages/cdb_appdirs.py
      - lib/python*/site-packages/cadabra2_defaults.py
      - share/man/man1/cadabra2.1
      - share/cadabra2/**/*
      - bin/cadabra2
    test:
      imports:
        - cadabra2
      commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/share/cadabra2/python/cadabra2.so
        - test -f $PREFIX/share/cadabra2/latex/preamble.tex

  - name: cadabra2-gtk
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
      host:
        - gtkmm-3.0
        - glibmm
        - cairomm-1.0
        - glib
        - sigcpp-2.0
        - pangomm-1.4
        - cairo
        - atkmm-1.6
        - jsoncpp
        - boost-cpp
        - sqlite
        - python
      run:
        # Remove these when they get run_exports
        - {{ pin_compatible("cairo") }}
        - {{ pin_compatible("glibmm") }}
        - {{ pin_compatible("glib") }}
        - boost-cpp
        - python
        - {{ pin_subpackage("cadabra2", exact=True) }}
      run_constrained:
        - cadabra2-jupyter-kernel {{ version }}
    files:
      - bin/cadabra2-gtk
      - bin/cadabra2latex
      - bin/cadabra-server
      - bin/cadabra2cadabra
      - bin/cadabra2html
      - bin/cadabra2python
      - bin/cadabra2-cli
      - share/icons/**/cadabra2*
      - share/man/man1/cadabra2-gtk.1
      - share/man/man1/cadabra-server.1
      - share/man/man1/cadabra2cadabra.1
      - share/man/man1/cadabra2html.1
      - share/man/man1/cadabra2python.1
      - share/applications/cadabra2*
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/bin/cadabra2-gtk

  - name: cadabra2-jupyter-kernel
    build:
      skip: True  # [win]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
      host:
        - xeus
        - libuuid
        - nlohmann_json
        - python
        - boost-cpp
        - jsoncpp
        - glibmm
      run:
        - python
        - boost-cpp
        # Remove these when they get run_exports
        - {{ pin_compatible("glibmm") }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage("cadabra2", exact=True) }}
      run_constrained:
        - cadabra2-gtk {{ version }}

    files:
      - bin/cadabra-jupyter-kernel
      - share/jupyter/kernels/cadabra/*
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/bin/cadabra-jupyter-kernel


about:
  home: https://github.com/kpeeters/cadabra2
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  license_family: GPL
  license_file:
    - LICENSE
    - libs/websocketpp/COPYING
    - libs/pybind11/LICENSE
    - libs/linenoise/LICENSE
    - libs/tiny-process-library/LICENSE
    - libs/whereami/LICENSE.WTFPLv2
  summary: 'a field-theory motivated approach to computer algebra'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - isuruf
